4.5"}],"\n",["$","li","li-2",{"children":["CLI-first approach (the ",["$","code",null,{"className":"block bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto mb-4","children":"claude"}]," command)"]}],"\n",["$","li","li-3",{"children":"CLAUDE.md project context files for persistent project knowledge"}],"\n",["$","li","li-4",{"children":"Hooks system, MCP server integration, slash ",["$","code",null,{"className":"block bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto mb-4","children":"claude"}]," (not ",["$","code",null,{"className":"block bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto mb-4","children":"claude-code"}],"). Configuration lives at ",["$","code",null,{"className":"block bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto mb-4","children":"~/.claude/settings.json"}],"."]}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"OpenCode"}],"\n",["$","pre",null,{"className":"bg-gray-800 rounded-lg overflow-hidden mb-4","children":["$","code",null,{"className":"block bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto mb-4","children":"npm install -g opencode\nopencode init\n"}]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Key Features Comparison"}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"Project Context"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Claude Code"}],": Uses CLAUDE.md files at the project root to provide persistent context — coding standards, architecture notes, and workflow instructions that persist across sessions. Run ",["$","code",null,{"className":"block bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto mb-4","children":"/init"}]," to generate one automatically."]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"OpenCode"}],": Uses configuration files and plugin-based context injection."]}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"IDE Integration"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Claude Code"}],": VS Code extension (official), JetBrains plugin (beta), standalone Desktop app, Web/Mobile interfaces, Chrome extension for live debugging."]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"OpenCode"}],": Web-based UI, VS Code plugin (community), terminal mode."]}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"Tool Integration"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Claude Code"}],": MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers for connecting to external tools, databases, and APIs. Built-in slash commands (",["$","code",null,{"className":"block bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto mb-4","children":"/init"}],", ",["$","code",null,{"className":"block bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto mb-4","children":"/debug"}],", etc.) for common workflows. Custom slash commands via ",["$","code",null,{"className":"block bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto mb-4","children":".claude/commands/"}]," directory."]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"OpenCode"}],": Plugin ecosystem with community-contributed integrations."]}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"Agent Architecture"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Claude Code"}],": Subagents for isolated parallel work. Agent teams for multi-agent collaboration. Planning mode for breaking down complex tasks before execution."]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 minor issue"}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"OpenCode"}]," (using execution"}],"\n",["$","li","li-3",{"children":"No code sent to external servers beyond the Anthropic API"}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6
